cards.flavor: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.
cards.name: Adarkar Valkyrie
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance

cards.flavor:
"More than snow falls from the Boreal skies."
-Arkin Egilsson, skycaptain

foreignPrintings.name: ボリアルのグリフィン

cards.name: Boreal Griffin
cards.text:
Flying
{S}: This creature gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

cards.name: Cover of Winter
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {S} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
If a creature would deal combat damage to you and/or one or more creatures you control, prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of age counters on this enchantment.
{S}: Put an age counter on this enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive."
-Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

foreignPrintings.name: キイェルドーの王、ダリアン

cards.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
cards.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

cards.flavor: The Knights of Stromgald struck Darien's Roost from two sides. They would have caught Kjeldor in a pincer attack were it not for Darien's tacticians.
cards.name: Field Marshal
cards.text: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

cards.name: Gelid Shackles
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
{S}: Enchanted creature gains defender until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

cards.name: Glacial Plating
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Cumulative upkeep {S} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 for each age counter on this Aura.

cards.name: Jötun Grunt
cards.text: Cumulative upkeep-Put two cards from a single graveyard on the bottom of their owner's library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

cards.name: Jötun Owl Keeper
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {W} or {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying for each age counter on it.

cards.flavor: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

foreignPrintings.name: キイェルドーのガーゴイル

cards.name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

foreignPrintings.name: キイェルドーの投槍兵

cards.name: Kjeldoran Javelineer
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{T}: This creature deals damage equal to the number of age counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

cards.flavor: "I listen to people. He sniffs the wind. And we both sense something big coming. Something very big."
cards.name: Kjeldoran Outrider
cards.text: {W}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: King Darien's breath crystallized and fell to the frozen battlefield, but its command carried true to all soldiers of New Argive.

foreignPrintings.name: キイェルドーのときの声

cards.name: Kjeldoran War Cry
cards.text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.

cards.flavor:
"The White Shield is not the burnished metal you lash to your forearm but the conviction that burns in your chest."
-Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield
cards.name: Luminesce
cards.text: Prevent all damage that black sources and red sources would deal this turn.

cards.flavor: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."
cards.name: Martyr of Sands
cards.text: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice this creature: You gain three times X life.

cards.flavor: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.
cards.name: Ronom Unicorn
cards.text: Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"The scouts claim the cold has malice, and a mind. I begin to believe them. Impassable drifts seem to appear before us at every turn."
-Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry
cards.name: Squall Drifter
cards.text:
Flying
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.flavor: "Heidar has forced the sun into hiding, but it has not forgotten us."
cards.name: Sun's Bounty
cards.text:
You gain 4 life.
Recover {1}{W} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

cards.text:
You may exile two white cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy all creatures.

cards.name: Surging Sentinels
cards.text:
First strike
Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast spells with the same name as this spell from among those cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

cards.flavor: Darien's call to Yavimaya would have fallen red to the snow had it not been for the agility of the aesthir.
cards.name: Swift Maneuver
cards.text:
Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Ursine Fylgja

This creature enters with four healing counters on it.

Defender, flying

cards.flavor: "Honor your steed and it will carry you to great deeds-and bring you home to tell of them."

Protection from black
{W}: This creature gains flying until end of turn.
{W}{W}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Terisiare has only two kinds of weather: cold and weird.
cards.name: Adarkar Windform
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{S}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

cards.flavor: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."
cards.name: Arcum Dagsson
cards.text: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

foreignPrintings.name: バルデュヴィアの霜覚師

cards.name: Balduvian Frostwaker
cards.text: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.

cards.name: Commandeer
cards.text:
You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters under your control.)

cards.name: Controvert
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Recover {2}{U}{U} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{U}{U}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

cards.name: Counterbalance
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card.

cards.flavor: Adarkar's blank wastes make the mind wander-and stray thoughts are quickly caught and devoured.
cards.name: Drelnoch
cards.text: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, you may draw two cards.

cards.flavor:
"Nature? Fire? Bah! Both are chaotic and difficult to control. Ice is structured, latticed, light as a feather, massive as a glacier. In ice, there is power!"
-Heidar, Rimewind master
cards.name: Flashfreeze
cards.text: Counter target red or green spell.

cards.flavor: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.
cards.name: Frost Raptor
cards.text:
Flying
{S}{S}: This creature gains shroud until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.flavor:
"Guard, fetch me a mallet."
-Heidar, Rimewind master
cards.name: Frozen Solid
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

cards.flavor: "The umber stain of the Thaw will be bleached away. Once again the world will be sharp, white, perfect!"

foreignPrintings.name: 霧氷風の使い手、ハイダー

Trample
This creature enters tapped.

cards.flavor: Plague-induced dreams became real as they swirled above Krov, mingling with the magical residue of the World Spell.

Flying
Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.

cards.name: Krovikan Whispers

cards.flavor:
"Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal."
-Zur the Enchanter
cards.name: Martyr of Frost
cards.text: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice this creature: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

cards.flavor: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.
cards.name: Perilous Research
cards.text: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.

Flying

cards.flavor: "The Thaw brings flooding, disease, and death. We will do all in our power to bring frigid peace back to the world."
cards.name: Rimewind Cryomancer
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Counter target activated ability. Activate only if you control four or more snow permanents. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

cards.flavor: "Find solace in the sun? Burning, blinding, laying secrets bare? No, solace is found under the blanket of cold."
cards.name: Rimewind Taskmage
cards.text: {1}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate only if you control four or more snow permanents.

cards.flavor: With the spread of Rimewind's sorcerous winter, snow dwellers reclaimed their places atop the food chain.

This creature can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land.

cards.flavor:

cards.flavor:
"Thick hides and layered armor won't help when I freeze you from the inside out."
-Heidar, Rimewind master

Flying

cards.flavor:

-Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol
cards.name: Deathmark
cards.text: Destroy target green or white creature.

cards.flavor: "You pray to Freyalise, but she cannot hear your pleas. It is Tevesh Szat who will claim your soul."

cards.flavor:
"Starving an army that feeds on its enemies is a sound strategy."
-Garza Zol, plague queen

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"There it was, clawing the ice as it chittered and clicked its teeth. We fled in horror before it unearthed its grisly meal."
-Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry
cards.name: Gristle Grinner
cards.text: Whenever a creature dies, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Make sure those wretches feed only upon the plagued. The blood of the healthy is reserved for me alone."
-Garza Zol, plague queen

Flying

cards.flavor: The few surviving humans of Krov would have welcomed the return of winter and its sterilizing cold. They often peered northward, hoping that the snow's edge had reached their infested city-tomb.
cards.name: Krovikan Scoundrel

cards.flavor: Puppeteered by Heidar's icy hand, they were sacrificed to the Frost Marsh to raise Haakon's army.

cards.text: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice this creature: Exile up to X target cards from a single graveyard.

At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each age counter on this enchantment.
When this enchantment is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

cards.flavor: The unfortunates so transformed hungered not for flesh, but for warmth.

cards.text:
Enchant creature

cards.flavor:
"Tresserhorn is ours now. Dredge the lake and bring me all the bones you find. We'll build you a new army, the likes of which Terisiare has never seen."
-Heidar, Rimewind master, to Haakon

cards.flavor: Kjeldorans who fled battle were exiled to the wastes. Those who strayed near Tresserhorn were pressed into service in Haakon's army.

cards.flavor: The World Spell thawed their icy graves, promising rest in soft, quiet earth at last. But Heidar called them to duty for a twisted cause.

Snow landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land.)
{S}: Regenerate this creature. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

cards.flavor:
"Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks."
-Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

cards.text: {T}: Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate only during the declare blockers step.

cards.flavor: "To a trained mind, the cold is but a momentary distraction."
cards.name: Braid of Fire
cards.text: Cumulative upkeep-Add {R}. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

cards.flavor: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.
cards.name: Cryoclasm
cards.text: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

cards.name: Earthen Goo

Trample

cards.text:
You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

cards.flavor: Clambering up and over the powdery slope, the goblin chanced upon a small furry thing. There they regarded each other: the goblin and his new pair of earmuffs.
cards.name: Goblin Furrier
cards.text: Prevent all damage that this creature would deal to snow creatures.

cards.flavor: Rimerunners set off avalanches to immobilize foes as well as to create more challenging slopes.

cards.text:
{T}: Target creature can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

cards.text:
This creature can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
{2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

cards.flavor: As the Thaw met Terisiare, mountains shed their icy skins, crushing homes and hopes alike.

cards.text:
Destroy target artifact or land.

"They're not easily trained. Fortunately, they already know how to kill."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

cards.flavor: "I lead my horde to the northwest. I won't return until the ice wizards fall and their fiendish contraptions are crushed!"

cards.flavor: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.
cards.name: Martyr of Ashes
cards.text: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice this creature: This creature deals X damage to each creature without flying.

cards.flavor: When a snowdrift shows you its eyes, it's already too late.

cards.flavor: Blood calls to blood.

Flying
{2}{S}: Tap target creature and put an ice counter on it. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
Creatures with ice counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

cards.flavor: Deep beneath the ice, beneath the soil and the rock, Dominaria's fire still burned hot.
cards.name: Rite of Flame
cards.text: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.

cards.flavor:
"This close to Rimewind Keep, no avalanche is nature's doing."
-Ukoten, centaur chieftain
cards.name: Skred
cards.text: Skred deals damage to target creature equal to the number of snow permanents you control.

cards.name: Stalking Yeti
cards.text:
When this creature enters, if it's on the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to this creature.
{2}{S}: Return this creature to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

cards.name: Surging Flame
cards.text:
Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast spells with the same name as this spell from among those cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
Surging Flame deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: Slicking the ice with its heated underside, the thermopod skates at great speed to overtake its prey.
cards.name: Thermopod
cards.text:
{S}: This creature gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
Sacrifice a creature: Add {R}.

cards.name: Allosaurus Rider
cards.text:
You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Arctic Nishoba
cards.text:
Trample
Cumulative upkeep {G} or {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When this creature dies, you gain 2 life for each age counter on it.

cards.name: Aurochs Herd
cards.text:
Trample
When this creature enters, you may search your library for an Aurochs card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

cards.flavor: Those who used reindeer as beasts of burden knew to avoid the centaurs, who raged at the enslavement of their spirit-kin.

foreignPrintings.name: ボリアルのケンタウルス

cards.name: Boreal Centaur
cards.text: {S}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

cards.flavor: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.
cards.name: Boreal Druid
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}.

cards.flavor:
"I have been trapped in the lizard's lair for days. It seems to regard me as its child and will not let me leave."
-Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry
cards.name: Brooding Saurian
cards.text: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents they own.

cards.flavor: The aurochs herd is content to graze-until the bull provides the dissenting urge to charge.
cards.name: Bull Aurochs
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

foreignPrintings.name: フレイアリーズの輝き

cards.name: Freyalise's Radiance
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Snow permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

cards.flavor: Its white webs glitter, mimicking the frost on the tree's branches.
cards.name: Frostweb Spider
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever this creature blocks a creature with flying, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature at end of combat.

cards.name: Hibernation's End
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Whenever you pay this enchantment's cumulative upkeep, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to the number of age counters on this enchantment, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
"Our border lands fall under the grip of Heidar's second winter. Go forth and reclaim them for Yavimaya."
-Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order
cards.name: Into the North
cards.text: Search your library for a snow land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: The strider's long, loping gait is an adaptation that allows it to move quickly in deep snow.

foreignPrintings.name: カープルーザンの徘徊者

cards.name: Karplusan Strider
cards.text: This creature can't be the target of blue or black spells.

cards.flavor: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."
cards.name: Martyr of Spores
cards.text: {1}, Reveal X green cards from your hand, Sacrifice this creature: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The sun-hot glow radiated from the druids, leaving scattered metal in steaming pools as it passed.
cards.name: Mystic Melting
cards.text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.flavor: The ohran viper is not cold-blooded. Its veins course with the same antigelid venom used to kill its prey.
cards.name: Ohran Viper
cards.text:
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Step lightly and we might be able to use it as a bridge."
-Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician
cards.name: Panglacial Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
While you're searching your library, you may cast this card from your library.

cards.name: Resize
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Recover {1}{G} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

cards.name: Rimehorn Aurochs
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
{2}{S}: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

cards.text:
Enchant creature
When this Aura enters, put six +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

cards.name: Sheltering Ancient
cards.text:
Trample
Cumulative upkeep-Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature an opponent controls. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

cards.flavor:
"It's odd to see the apes rip down trees to arm themselves in defense of their forests."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter
cards.name: Simian Brawler
cards.text: Discard a land card: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"If you call the wolves, ensure you have a worthy hunt, or you may become the hunted."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter
cards.name: Sound the Call
cards.text: Create a 1/1 green Wolf creature token. It has "This token gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard."

cards.flavor: Its belly produces a boiling-hot fluid it can spit as a weapon or spin slowly enough to freeze into a defensive web.
cards.name: Steam Spitter
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Flying
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, choose one -

• That player discards a card.

cards.flavor:
"There are deep, deep places in this world that have long burned hot with little regard for the whitening of the earth's thin skin."
-Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper
cards.name: Deepfire Elemental
cards.text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target artifact or creature with mana value X.

cards.flavor:
"That such delicate creatures could become so powerful in the embrace of winter is yet more proof that I am right."
-Heidar, Rimewind master

cards.flavor: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

杜松騎士団のレインジャー

cards.name: Juniper Order Ranger
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

cards.flavor: Karplusan legend told of an orc so cruel that he burned his own followers in rage-yet so revered that they rose from their pyres to serve him.

foreignPrintings.name: 死の守り手、セックァー

cards.name: Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper
cards.text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste.

cards.flavor: When Freyalise spoke the World Spell, the tamanoa rose to bring a new morning to Terisiare.
cards.name: Tamanoa
cards.text: Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life.

cards.flavor: Out of sight, into mind.
cards.name: Vanish into Memory
cards.text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.flavor:
"Don't be so quick to reclaim the thawing lands. They might have acquired a taste for freedom."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter
cards.name: Wilderness Elemental
cards.text:
Trample
Wilderness Elemental's power is equal to the number of nonbasic lands your opponents control.

cards.flavor: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
cards.name: Zur the Enchanter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Zur attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.
cards.name: Coldsteel Heart
cards.text:
This artifact enters tapped.
As this artifact enters, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

cards.name: Jester's Scepter
cards.text:
When this artifact enters, exile the top five cards of target player's library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled.
{2}, {T}, Put a card exiled with this artifact into its owner's graveyard: Counter target spell if it has the same name as that card.

cards.flavor:
"Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ."
-Heidar, Rimewind master
cards.name: Mishra's Bauble
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.flavor: It took the Rimewind cultists days to realize they had successfully activated the creature-it just wasn't interested in moving.

cards.flavor:
"A realm once green now ruled by Frost,
Where flesh and field both pay its cost.
Those dearly loved, forever lost . . ."
-The Dynasty of Winter Kings

cards.flavor:

As ice and woe both grip our land?
The helpless feel his frozen brand."
-The Dynasty of Winter Kings

cards.flavor:
"Now caged in Winter's bitter chill,
Our people cry, their voices shrill-
Eternal cold breaks down their will."
-The Dynasty of Winter Kings

cards.flavor:
"Our noble land, enslaved by Rime,
Is it our fate to freeze through time?
If this be true, oh wicked crime."
-The Dynasty of Winter Kings
